description__step-sobre: I am a developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions. With experience in web development, I always seek to deliver high-quality products that meet user needs.
description__step-reserva: I have solid skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as experience with modern frameworks like React and Vue.js. I also have knowledge in backend development with Node.js and Python.
description__step-frigelar: Beyond web development, I have an interest in UI/UX design, accessibility, and performance. I believe that a good user experience is fundamental to the success of any digital product.
description__step-livelo: Currently, I am focused on expanding my knowledge in mobile application development and emerging technologies like WebAssembly and Progressive Web Apps.
description__step-itmidia: Outside the development environment, I enjoy contributing to the tech community through articles, tutorials, and event participation. I believe that knowledge sharing is essential for the growth of the field.
